item.title: Disassembling Go AVX-512
item.description: The problem Go 1.11 got updated assembler that supports AVX-512, but disassembler is left unchanged. In other words, go tool asm speaks AVX-512, go tool objdump does not. Suppose we have this avx.s file: TEXT Â·avxCheck(SB), 0, $0 VPOR X0, X1, X2 //; AVX1 VPOR Y0, Y1, Y2 //; AVX2 VPORD.BCST (DX), Z1, K2, Z2 //; AVX-512 RET You will be surprised after assemble+disassemble attempt: $ go tool asm avx.s $ go tool objdump avx.
